description: With 150 new game stages,Super Monkey Ball 2provides hours of slipping and sliding through colorful environments with the same tricky gameplay moves as before. You still tilt and angle the board to maneuver your ball-encased monkey through courses that range from easy to wildly complex and fraught with peril.Super Monkey Ball 2provides background info on its characters with a new story mode that includes 10 monkey worlds. You will see what these persevering primates are made of when they are forced to face up to a big ape who steals their bananas. Information about the characters appears throughout the game, so you'll learn more about them as you play.Super Monkey Ball 2includes six brand-new party games, including Monkey Boat Race, Monkey Shot, Monkey Dog Fight, Monkey Tennis, Monkey Baseball, and Monkey Soccer. One to four players can team up or compete.
